Headline: #124 Navy Pier Temporary Reroute near Columbus/Randolph
ShortDescription: 124 Navy Pier buses temp. rerouted WB: Grand, State and Madison; EB: Washington, State and Illinois : due to, street blockage near Columbus/Randolph.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#124 Navy Pier buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions near Columbus/Randolph due to street blockage near Columbus/Randolph.

Westbound buses will operate via Grand, State and Madison including the normal route streets.

Eastbound buses will operate via Washington, State and Illinois.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #3 King Drive Temporary Northbound Reroute near King Drive/26th
ShortDescription: Northbound 3 King Drive buses are temporarily rerouted via: King Drive, 26th and Michigan due to, street blockage near King Drive/26th.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Northbound #3 King Drive buses are temporarily rerouted via: King Drive, 26th and Michigan due to, street blockage near King Drive/26th.

Southbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.
